name: StateEnemy
description:
2142. Following the appearance of a portal, demons began to cross it to seize the Earth, but the new technologies allowed the man to isolate the place where the portal and the monsters are appeared to be able to send an improved soldier to fight them. You are this hero, fight them to save the planet from extermination. This game is very simple but not easy. Here are the keys of the game:
walk = z
Running = é
Backward = s
Go to the left = q
Go to the right = d
Space = jump
Left mouse button = hit
And finally your brain 😈
This game does not contain automatic or manual backups, it is to finish at one time, however you can press the P key to pause the game. Good luck and good game everyone Ps: observation is the key
